Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Hepatocytes of the ILK / liver - / - mice continued to proliferate up until day 10 .

Note: "Hepatocytes" and "liver" are not diseases in the classical sense, but they are mentioned in the context of the paragraph as entities related to the study of a disease. "ILK" is also not a disease, but rather a gene knockout model used to study liver regeneration.

The entities "Hepatocytes" and "ILK" do not clearly refer to a disease, so they have been removed from the list. The entity "liver" is the only valid disease-related entity in the paragraph.
